column5: Any hassles if you are driving a leased vehicle when you cross into Canada? Thanks
About 4 years ago, I leased a Ford and took across 3 years in a row, they never asked any questions about the ownership of the truck. Basically, I wouldn't worry about it. Hope this helps.
As long as you have the registration and drivers license/proof of ownership there will be no problems.

Just to take this one a step further, last year while heading to LOTW we had a major breakdown and had to rent a car. Not one problem at all bringing it over the border in either direction just sucked having to pay for it while it sat in a parking lot for 7 days tho.
